thread.title: Global Stocks ‘Nonchalant’ as U.S. Shutdown Squabble Rolls On

author: Lucy Craymer
title: Global Stocks ‘Nonchalant’ as U.S. Shutdown Squabble Rolls On
text:
U.S. stocks edged higher Friday, as investors focused on corporate earnings and largely brushed off the threat of a U.S. government shutdown.
Financial companies rose in recent trading, after several regional banks reported fourth-quarter results. Citizens Financial Group rose 1.3% after its earnings beat analyst expectations, while shares of Regions Financial added 1.8%.

The...
